Package model

Interface Searcher<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the objects being searched, must implement the interface
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Searcher<T>
Functional interface for searching a Collection of objects using a specified search query and field getter.

The search results are returned as a List of objects.

  • Method Details

    • search

      <U extends Comparable<? super U>, V extends Iterable<T>, R extends List<T>> R search(@NotNull V searchable, U query, Function<T,U> fieldGetter)
      Searches a collection of searchable objects for matches to a query based on a given field, using the provided field getter function. The query and field must be of the same type and, they must implement the Comparable interface.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the query
      V - the type of the searchable collection
      R - the type of the resulting list of matches
      Parameters:
      searchable - the collection of searchable objects to search through
      query - the query to search for
      fieldGetter - the function to extract the field to search on from each searchable object
      Returns:
      A list of matches found in the Collection
      See Also:
      • Collection

    • searchingInt

      static <T> List<T> searchingInt(@NotNull @NotNull List<T> list, Integer value, Function<T,Integer> fieldGetter)
      Searches a list of searchable objects for matches to an integer value based on a given field, using the provided field getter function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the searchable objects
      Parameters:
      list - the list of searchable objects to search through
      value - the integer value to search for
      fieldGetter - the function to extract the integer field to search on from each searchable object
      Returns:
      A list of matches found in the Collection
      See Also:

    • searchingString

      static <T> List<T> searchingString(@NotNull @NotNull List<T> list, String query, Function<T,String> fieldGetter)
      Searches a list of searchable objects for matches to a string value based on a given field, using the provided field getter function. The search is case-insensitive.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the searchable objects
      Parameters:
      list - the list of searchable objects to search through
      query - the string value to search for
      fieldGetter - the function to extract the string field to search on from each searchable object
      Returns:
      A list of matches found in the Collection
      See Also:
      • Collection

    • searchingDate

      static <T> List<T> searchingDate(@NotNull @NotNull List<T> list, LocalDate value, Function<T,LocalDate> fieldGetter)
      Searches for all objects in the given list that have the specified date value using binary search. The list is sorted in ascending order based on the value returned by the given field getter function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the searchable objects
      Parameters:
      list - the list of searchable objects
      value - the date value to search for
      fieldGetter - a function that returns the date value from a searchable object
      Returns:
      a list of objects that have the specified date value

    • searchingByRange

      static <T> List<T> searchingByRange(@NotNull @NotNull List<T> list, double lowerBound, double upperBound, Function<T,Double> fieldGetter)
      Searches for all objects in the given list that have a value within the specified range using binary search. The list is sorted in ascending order based on the value returned by the given field getter function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the searchable objects
      Parameters:
      list - the list of searchable objects
      lowerBound - the lower bound of the range
      upperBound - the upper bound of the range
      fieldGetter - a function that returns the value to search for from a searchable object
      Returns:
      a list of objects that have a value within the specified range

    • searchingByCondition

      static <T, U extends Comparable<? super U>> List<T> searchingByCondition(@NotNull @NotNull List<T> list, Function<T,U> fieldGetter, BiPredicate<U,U> condition, U target)
      Searches for all objects in the given list that meet the specified condition using binary search. The list is sorted in ascending order based on the value returned by the given field getter function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the searchable objects
      U - the type of the value to compare
      Parameters:
      list - the list of searchable objects
      fieldGetter - a function that returns the value to search for from a searchable object
      condition - a condition that the value must meet
      target - the target value to compare the elements of the list to
      Returns:
      a list of objects that meet the specified condition

    • binarySearch

      static <T, U> List<Integer> binarySearch(List<T> list, U target, Function<T,U> keyExtractor, Comparator<? super U> comparator)
      Performs a binary search on the given list using the given target value and key extractor function. The list is assumed to be sorted in ascending order based on the value returned by the key extractor function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the list elements
      U - the type of the key value
      Parameters:
      list - the list to search
      target - the value to search for
      keyExtractor - a function that returns the value to compare from a list element
      comparator - a comparator for the key value type
      Returns:
      a list of indexes of the elements that match the target value
      See Also:
      • Comparator
      • Function

    • binarySearchInRange

      static <T> List<Integer> binarySearchInRange(List<T> list, Function<T,Double> fieldGetter, double low, double high)
      Performs a binary search on the given list using the given field getter function to retrieve the search value. The list is assumed to be sorted in ascending order based on the values returned by the field getter function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the list elements
      Parameters:
      list - the list to search
      fieldGetter - a function that returns the search value from a list element
      low - the lower bound of the range to search for
      high - the upper bound of the range to search for
      Returns:
      a list of indexes of the elements that have a value within the specified range
      See Also:
      • Function

    • binarySearchByCondition

      static <T, U extends Comparable<? super U>> List<Integer> binarySearchByCondition(List<T> list, Function<T,U> fieldGetter, BiPredicate<U,U> condition, U target)
      This method performs a binary search in a sorted list based on a given condition.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the list.
      U - The type of the field to compare.
      Parameters:
      list - The list to search through.
      fieldGetter - A function that returns the field to use for the comparison.
      condition - The condition to check for.
      target - The target value to compare the elements of the list to.
      Returns:
      A list of indexes in the original list that contain elements that meet the condition.
      See Also:
      • Function
      • BiPredicate

    • collectMatches

      static <T> List<T> collectMatches(List<T> list, List<Integer> indexes)
      Collects the list elements at the specified indexes from the given list.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the list elements
      Parameters:
      list - the list of elements to collect from
      indexes - a list of indexes of the elements to collect
      Returns:
      a list of the elements at the specified indexes
